name: topCoins
description: Get top DeFi protocols ranked by TVL with market data, token addresses, chain TVL breakdown, and trend analysis. Filter by chain (Base, Ethereum, etc.) or category (DEX, Lending, etc.).

limit.description: Number of protocols to return (1-50). Default: 10

topProtocols.description: Array of protocols with: name, symbol, category, tokenAddress (0x format), tvl, tvlRaw, mcap, fdv, volume24h, change (1h/1d/7d), trend, chains, chainTvls (top 5 by TVL), url

summary.description: Total protocols, total TVL, average 1d change, chain/category filters

categoryBreakdown.description: TVL breakdown by category with percentages
